snippet.title: eBaseball Powerful Pro Yakyuu 2022 (Switch) - Gameplay
snippet.description: A full game of eBaseball Powerful Pro Yakyuu 2022, Nintendo Switch version, by Konami. Orix Buffaloes vs. Chiba Lotte Marines. These are maybe the best two starting pitchers in Japan right now: Yoshinobu Yamamoto on the Buffaloes and Roki Sasaki on the Marines. The Marines also have a few other players MLB fans may recognize, Adeiny Hechavarria, Brandon Laird, and Leonys Martin.
